RingCentral offers a feature rich, all-inclusive pure cloud play for your business communications needs. A UCaaS platform built for our mobile-centric world, we are redefining the industry standard. Recently named the top Market Leader by Gartner in the Unified Communications Magic Quadrant and 2016 TMC Internet Telephony Product of the Year. RingCentral Denver has also been named in the Denver Post "Top Places to Work" for the 3rd consecutive year.

Talent Acquisition/Talent Management  consulting company specializing in full life-cycle recruiting within innovative technology organizations who are disrupting their respective spaces.  Experienced in recruitment process creation, implementation, training, retention, and placement of contract and full-time employees.

Why SnapLogic? SnapLogic is a cloud integration pioneer and award-winning innovator. Companies must connect data and process between their cloud and applications (and platforms) such as Salesforce, Workday, ServiceNow and Amazon Redshift as well as with on-premises and social data sources. SnapLogic is 100% focused on ushering companies into the cloud era with a true cloud-based, elastic integration platform.Focused on domestic and international recruiting in all areas of the business including:  Sales, Solutions Engineers, Marketing, and Development (Big Data, Java, Front-End, Tech Support, DevOps, etc) with a continual focus on candidate experience and cultural fit.Evangelist for new Boulder office within Denver/Boulder start-up community including hosting and speaking at events, attending meetups and User Groups, and gaining visibility through Built in Colorado, Boulder and Denver start-up weeks, and other avenues.

Hubble® is an integrated suite of performance management apps from insightsoftware.com. It offers reporting, analytics and planning in a single real-time solution that fully understands yourERP. Hubble integrates your critical business systems so users at all levels have access to live data—extraordinarily fast. With this type of visibility, everyone can easily understand, manage andpredict the business.Recruited Top Talent to support our High Performance Culture nationwide for Pre-sales, Sales, and Professional Services and in Denver for Support, Business Development, Engineering, and Marketing for Hubble, an integrated suite of Business Performance Management (BPM) applications.  Hubble offers reporting, analytics and planning in a single real-time solution that fully understands yourERP. It integrates your critical business systems so users at all levels have access to live data—extraordinarily fast. With this type of visibility, everyone can easily understand, manage andpredict the business.  Member of a strategic team focused on HR and Operations initiatives. Initially hired to recruit Global 500 and Major Accounts Sales Executives.Moved on to support numerous new acquisitions such as Boomi and Compellent in implementing consistent recruiting process, recruiting, and assimilating all talent acquisition functions into one unified corporate culture.  Finished up recruited for exciting full time roles for ERP consultants nationwide (formerly Perot Systems).  These positions required 75% travel and could be located anywhere in the US. I had the opportunity to work with Stacey at Insightsoftware.com for approx. two years. Stacey was always proactive in her approach with both hiring managers and candidates regarding the hiring process.  She also did a great job at keeping executive management informed of issues/concerns that impacted the recruitment of top talent (i.e. compensation, employment branding, etc).  I would highly recommend Stacey for an executive level or mgt recruitment role. Her overall business judgment and strong understanding of both the strategic and tactical aspects of recruiting make her a great asset in hiring and retaining top talent.

When I met Stacey in 2007 she was working on contract for one of our largest clients in Denver. Her reputation was outstanding, and her contract was extended beyond the anticipated timeframe. In 2010 (once this work wrapped up),  I requested that she come to work  directly on my team.  In this role, she had the overwhelming responsibility of being my only recruiting resource.  The volume of work she took on was  more than any one person should  be asked to do. In spite of that, she was extremely professional, dedicated, hardworking and upbeat. Stacey is an easy person to work with,  and a highly capable, strong Recruiter.

summary: Strategic Recruiting and HR Leader with a passion for innovation and focus on candidate experience, possessing a breadth and depth of knowledge and experience in Talent Acquisition/Management and HR with both global, multi-national organizations and entrepreneurial start-ups.  Creative problem-solver skilled at devising strategies that positively impact organizational culture. Develop recruiting and retention processes that improve employee performance leading to increased productivity and bottom-line results. Adept at management and staff level coaching, enhancing leadership skills and increasing efficiency. Expert at aligning HR strategy with other functional areas to achieve business goals.Strong self-starter and go-getter who excels in challenging environments to consistently meet and exceed expectations.
